text:
Hire an Esquire | Web Developer Roles | Pittsburgh, PA | Full Time | ONSITE | https://hireanesquire.com/careers/

We’re looking for mid-level and senior backend and full stack developers who are passionate about writing clean and well-tested code. Our stack is built on Python, Django + Django Rest Framework, and React + Redux, but candidates don’t need to have experience with those specifically.

Hire an Esquire’s goal is to propel legal staffing into the future. We are working on ground-breaking technology that blends industrial psychology, matching algorithms, and a superb customer experience that is changing the legal industry.

Please be sure to mention HN in your application!
